title: How long does the Surface Book’s battery last in tablet mode?
text:
How long does the Surface Book’s battery last in tablet mode? 
Published By: BGR.com - Yesterday 
Microsoft said during its massive Windows 10 hardware event earlier this week that the “ultimate” Surface Book laptop will last 12 hours...
